description: Review your vision board. Look at your goals. Remind yourself why youe doing this!
Be it phone, Twitter, Facebook, etc., connecting with somebody puts you and your message top of mind!
Tried to call somebody, but only get voicemail? Leave a message with your purpose and hope...
Use the US Post Office to help get a higher than 90% open rate!
Coffee, lunch, whatever. If it's face to face, it's good!
Did you get some sort of movement... yesterday? Did you eat well... yesterday?
Develop some helpful content. Need an idea? Answer the last question a prospect asked.
Help somebody else out and give a great referral!
Nothing like getting a personal note.
Mark up a point for a new high-quality connection on LinkedIn.
